name: nox (itch) (pinosaur)
description:
You are 'Mesa', the legendary warrior that consumes weapons of his fallen enemies to gain strength. Slash through waves of orcs, mages and legendary beasts in this hack and slash survival game as you wield a variety of weapons from those that you have slain.

Controls =-=-=-=-=-=

WSAD - movement

E - pickup weapon

SPACE - attack

Picking up a new weapon consumes your previously held weapon but restores some health.

Info =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

Created for MiniJam 109 using rust and the bevy game engine. Source code can be found here

Creators: Nithin Muthukumar, Daniel Liu
